verbose_text: Stable isotope labeling of DNA has been widely used along with MS to examine the reactive sites and cytosine methylation on the formation of 8-oxo-dG and downstream oxidation products of reactions with nitrosoperoxycarbonate and riboflavin mediated photolysis using MRM.19 Experiments were done on 15 N 3, 13 C 1 -labeled DNA oligodeoxynucleotides synthesized by standard phophoramidite chemistry using a DNA synthesizer.
